text: @RepMattGaetz And we now have Murder Wasps in the NW which have been sighted since December.  At least two separate areas had the MW introduced concurrently as the colonies were not related.  Same time as coronavirus.   And the MW will affect..... food production.   Huh. Isn’t that strange?
